column1: Art Institute of Chicago////We didn't spend a lot of time in here as we didn't arrive until 8 pm on a Friday night and we were exhausted from walking around the city. We couldn't pass it up however
column2: since it was free admission. We saw what we could and enjoyed every minute of it. The next time I come to Chicago
column3: I'm definitely carving out a good 3 hour chunk of my time to spend here. What a great museum.
